jcr:content.jcr:description: Training & Workshops, CQ Adobe® Authorized Instructors (ACI) & AATC

content-text.text:
Our classes are taught by CQ Adobe® Authorized Instructors (ACI) around the world or at our Adobe® Authorized Training Center in Latin America (AATC)

We offer high-quality training for all levels from authors to architects.  Whether just beginning or at an advanced level, we have the expertise to take you further.

rightcontentbox_0.heading: Need CQ5 classes in India?
rightcontentbox_0.links: \{"url":"mailto:training@xumak.com","text":" We deliver ALL the official CQ5 Adobe® courses as far as India! Please contact us for more information at training@xumak.com"}

CQ 5.5 Author
textimage.heading: ADOBE® TRAINING COURSES OFFERED @ XUMAK

container.heading: Official Adobe® Classes Offered On Demmand

textimage_0.description: Audience: The CQ 5.5 Developer class is designed for developers who wish to learn more about application development with the CQ WCM Platform.
textimage_0.heading: Sessions in Guatemala City, Guatemala: CQ 5.5 Developer Training.

textimage_1.description: The CQ5.5 System Administrator training focuses on how to install, configure, maintain and troubleshoot CQ5.
textimage_1.heading: Sessions in Guatemala City: CQ 5.5 System Administration Training

textimage_2.description:
XumaK’s professional services experience with CQ and JCR based applications, since we were founded in 2003, have taught us a lot about what makes a customer successful.

Whether it is an implementation, a migration, a product upgrade or even correcting someone else’s mistake, we've seen it all. Some might even call us "experts", either way; we want to share our knowledge with you.

We are pleased to offer the Official Adobe® classes and a series of custom Workshops specifically designed for Adobe® CQ5 customers and partners. Each class offers a comprehensive approach to the subject matter and includes best practices, common mistakes, important fringe topics and relevant examples, some provided by students. The Workshops can be configured to support Train-the-Trainer programs and educate implementation teams.

XumaK's high-quality training and workshops are taught by not only experienced and patient professionals, but by CQ Adobe® Certified Instructors (ACI). Our CQ ACI instructors have real-world experience in CQ-implementations and have helped customers just like you realize CQ’s true potential in their environment.

Adobe® has granted XumaK an Adobe® Authorized Training Center (AATC) in Latin America... which proves that we are true experts on this product.
textimage_2.heading: XumaK delivering training since its inception!

content.description:
FOR ADDITIONAL SAVINGS , when registering for one of our training in our AATC in Guatemala City, the following is included in the price package:

  • Hard copy for training materials
  • Transportation from Airport to Hotel and Hotel to Airport
  • Transportation from Hotel to XumaK's office
  • Breakfast & Lunch
  • Lodging
    • For developer: up to 5 nights
    • For Sys Admin: up to 4 nights
    • Once you are registered, we will book your hotel and will send you your itinerary within 24 hrs

textimage_3.description:
CONTACT US TO INQUIRE ABOUT OUR CLASSES OR TO REGISTER

email us @ training@xumak.com or call us at +1.213.232.3366
